name: Out of Depth (Balázs Vizi)
description:
Be part of the adventures of Sam, a small fish who has to leave the safety of an underwater cave when food runs out. The outside world is full of dangerous creatures, and to make matters worse, the water level keeps dropping.

Collect starfish along the way to unlock upgrades and rewards, but most importantly, survive until you find food and shelter again.

Android and Windows desktop version coming soon.
